org.mokai.impl.camel
Class RoutingEngineMBean

java.lang.Object
  org.mokai.impl.camel.RoutingEngineMBean

public class RoutingEngineMBean
extends Object

This class will be exposed as an JMX Bean wrapping a CamelRoutingEngine and exposing some of its methods and operations.

Author:
German Escobar

Method Detail

start

@ManagedOperation(description="Starts all the applications and connections that are stopped.",
                  impact=ACTION)
public void start()

                  impact=ACTION)
public void stop()

public int getNumFailedMessages()
